nodes.text: The Fariso was a civilian YT-1300 light freighter that operated during the Galactic Civil War.

The Fariso was operated by a retired TIE pilot named Jenson Marsh. During 1 ABY, the Fariso was tasked with carrying important cargo to the Endor Space Station. To ensure that the Fariso made it safely, a spacer escorted the YT-1300 and defended it from attacking Rebel starfighters.
